Title: Avengers: Endgame
Writer: Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely, Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Jack Kirby (based on the Marvel comics by), Jim Starlin (comic book)
Actors: Brie Larson, Robert Downey Jr., Karen Gillan, Tessa Thompson
Plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.

Title: Shazam!
Writer: Henry Gayden (screenplay by), Henry Gayden (story by), Darren Lemke (story by), Bill Parker (Shazam created by), C.C. Beck (Shazam created by)
Actors: Zachary Levi, Djimon Hounsou, Mark Strong, Jack Dylan Grazer
Plot: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson's case, by shouting out one word - SHAZAM! - this streetwise fourteen-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult superhero Shazam.
